review.title: “Don't get sick”
review.pros: Pros – Specific open and close times. Consistent lunch schedule.
review.cons: Cons – Very rigid sick and vacation time. If you have sick children or get sick yourself you can expect to be fired if you need more time off. I had a child needing surgery and I was let go due to the recuperation time off request.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get more family oriented or you'll spend all your time training replacements instead of having a cohesive work force.
